title: New Again
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 62 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 150L
description: Turn trash into treasure! New Again explores how children can transform used household objects into new art projects. Photographs illustrate the creative transformations, such as a bucket becoming drum and a water bottle becoming sprinkler. The book offers the opportunity to teach about main idea and details and declarative sentences.
reviewWords: airplane, bucket, drum, fort, make, phone, puppet, sprinkler, things
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /u/ sound
grammar: Declarative Sentences                : Recognize and use declarative sentences
wordWork: Compound Words                : Define and use compound words
